function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of mathematical models and calculations","Impact":"Misinterpretation of results or misapplication of the model could lead to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Validation of model assumptions and results by domain experts, double-checking of calculations","Technologies":"Validation tools, sensitivity analysis software","People":"Researchers, analysts, decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, domain experts"},{"Description":"Data privacy and confidentiality","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive data could lead to privacy breaches and misuse of personal information","Mitigation":"Encryption of sensitive data, access control measures, compliance with data protection regulations","Technologies":"Encryption tools, access management software, compliance monitoring systems","People":"Researchers, data analysts, data subjects","Owner":"Data protection officers, researchers, data analysts"},{"Description":"Insufficient documentation and attribution","Impact":"Difficulty in replicating the study, lack of transparency in research methodology and data sources","Mitigation":"Thorough documentation of research methodology, clear attribution of data sources, publication of detailed study materials","Technologies":"Research documentation platforms, version control systems, open data repositories","People":"Researchers, peer reviewers, readers of the study","Owner":"Researchers, research institutions"}]}
